core_constraints.name: station_outflow_controllable
core_constraints.description: Each station can split its incoming flow arbitrarily among its outgoing ducts.

core_constraints.name: duct_outflow_fixed
core_constraints.description: Each duct distributes its inflow to downstream nodes in fixed given percentages summing to at most 100.

core_constraints.name: flow_conservation_per_duct
core_constraints.description: For each duct, the sum of output percentages is â‰¤ 100; remainder is lost (assumed).

core_constraints.name: single_source
core_constraints.description: All flow originates from station 1 (assumed from problem statement).

objective.description: Maximize the minimum percentage of total Flubber received by any reservoir.

invariant.name: linear_flow_network
invariant.description: Flow propagation is linear and deterministic given station splitting decisions; optimal solution exists via convex optimization or binary search with feasibility LP (assumed).
